titles.title: I've A Message From The Lord, Hallelujah

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've a message from the Lord, Hallelujah
And it's only that you praise and sing
It's recorded in God's Word, Hallelujah
And it's only that you praise and sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise and sing, my people sing
Let the Hallelujahs ring
For the battle is the Lord's Hallelujah
And it's only that you praise and sing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alabad, y adored.
Gritad: Aleluya, Amen
La batalla es del Se√±or, Aleluya.
Y es solo que que canteis y alabeis.
